string_table.string: Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.
To watch this video, use the preview feature in Storyline 360, upload your published output to a server, publish to Review 360, or switch to static video quality.
Streaming video is unavailable for local playback.

terms.term: are data warehouses containing values and qualifiers that guide membership or claims transactions through the NASCO Processing System (NPS).

has a role in the Payment Integrity pricing process to provide real-time pricing services for the NPS to price claim lines itself or with an external third party claim pricing application such as Optum.

is a vendor whose role in the Payment Integrity pricing process is to provide real-time pricing for single or multiple claim lines that have been included for Optum pricing itself or combination with NetworX / NPSfor allocation.
The capability that determines the allowed amount for a claim line.
